title: If i Delete my Club, can i use the tag in the next one i create?
body:
Hello, I'm plannign re-do my club since it has a inside joke between my friends and i didn't know it showed in game until recently, and i thought of a better name, but i like the actual tag, but i don't know if it will allow me to re-use it even if i delete the former club first.
Does somebody knows how it works?

replies.body:
If everyone leaves the club and you delete it, the club tag should become available for your next club.

Check out our [Clubs FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207994746-Guide-to-Clubs) for more info. Let me know if you have any questions.
